metadata.title: CVE-2019-10255 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An Open Redirect vulnerability for all browsers in Jupyter Notebook before5.7.7 and some browsers (Chrome, Firefox) in JupyterHub before 0.9.5 allowscrafted links to the login page, which will redirect to a malicious siteafter successful login. Servers running on a base_url prefix are notaffected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 6.0.3-2
python3-notebook - 6.0.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.3-2').
